name: Commander Keen 2: The Earth Explodes
description:
Commander Keen 2: The Earth Explodes is an action, arcade and platformer game developed by id Software. It was originally released in 1990. Apogee Software published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Commander Keen 2: The Earth Explodes is available on PC.
John Romero and Tom Hall produced the game. It was directed by John Romero and Tom Hall.
